website_summaries.verdict: Targeted at individuals with a limited budget and modest printing demands, the Canon Pixma MG2220 earns a recommendation for its expansive software offering and excellent photo image quality.
pros: The Pixma MG2220 is one of the least expensive products in Canon's lineup, but it hits hard with above-average output speed and a useful photo-editing software suite
cons: With no Ethernet port or Wi-Fi, there's no way to share this printer on a network without installing drivers on each host computer

customer_reviews.title: Great All in One Printer!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this printer/scanner/copier. I've used it over and over again to print large and small jobs and to scan dozen of documents. My only complaint is that Cannon hasn't provided a "two-pack" for the black ink or colored ink cartridges. Instead the only two pack they offer comes with photo paper - something I definitely do not need. But other than that, the ink usage is good and keeps printing until the streaks appear from "no more ink". I especially like this since most printers stop before the ink is actually gone which wastes ink. I would recommend this printer to anyone who needs good quality printing.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT COME WITH NEEDED CABLE!
customer_reviews.text: So, explain the logic to me in selling a printer that is completely un-usable without the USB cable needed to use it. Now, I could certainly understand this omission from the product if it were a wireless printer. But it's not. So why in bloody h--- would you sell a product without some of the equipment needed to use the darned thing? Is it worth making customers mad when they realize "you do not include this needed part" for a $3.00 part? Really???? And don't tell me "look at the box" because I do not get to see the box until I receive it! I will not buy another product from Canon-------------
customer_reviews.author: Patrianne

customer_reviews.title: A Real Value
customer_reviews.text: For a printer, copier, and scanner I paid $44.00, exclusive of shipping. Canon website price was $69.99. Positive experience with seller. Printer works fine, and I like its features. The only downside is that Canon only offers a three-month warranty! Any problems after that you'll pay for it to be replaced. However, Canon is a very good brand and I think I'm going to have a good run with this printer.
customer_reviews.author: P. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Prints beautiful pictures
customer_reviews.text: I don't print much so I only needed an inexpensive printer. This one was a great deal on sale. The two test pictures that were printed looked amazing compared to the 5 year old printer it replaced. I don't need wireless so the fact this printer is cable only was not a problem The 5 year old printer was a Canon too and it still worked. It was thrown out only because new ink was so expensive it was cheaper to get this printer. So in my experience, a Canon printer will keep working until you don't want it anymore, and the picture quality is great for light usage like mailing pictures to people.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: If you need one, this is a good one
customer_reviews.text: This machine works great, keeps you informed what it is doing, and has very neat software. Like every other printer I ever had, the ink is expensive, (hence 4 stars), but it does seem to get better ink "mileage" than my last machine. Good scans, good negative scan s, nice prints, and the price was right. I especially like buying from Amazon because the shipping was really quick, even with the optional free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: doctrains

customer_reviews.title: Canon Pixma MG2220 a Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: I saw this printer listed in Consumer Report as a good buy. I went online to search for it and Amazon had each which made me happy. I am very happy with my Canon Pixma MG2220. It prints my document clearly and quickly. I also like that the ink cartridges are not that expensive. It use to be that it was cheaper to buy another printer than buy the ink cartridges. It has yet to jam up which is refreshing. Loading the ink cartridges is also easy.
customer_reviews.author: Naegea

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the price.
customer_reviews.text: You must purchase or have on hand a copier to computer cord that is not included. I picked one up at Radio Shack. Order one with this purchase as you will get all the way to the end of set up, and find there is no way to connect copier to computer. I was surprised how well the photo paper worked. Also my Mac Air does not have a CD port, so I had to connect a DVD player in order to do the set up. Copier works fine for the small amount of copy, scanning and printing that I do.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl m stewart

customer_reviews.title: Good printer, if a bit cryptic
customer_reviews.text: Got this printer for my grandmother, and while it works well and prints very nice, like the Pixma MX300 I was hoping to emulate, the one area it falls short in is the control panel. I'm an IT person and without the manual, you aren't going to figure out the settings via the control panel on top, as it utilizes cryptic icons on the calculator like display. Other than that though, it is a very well functioning and well built machine, like other Canon printers I've had. A good value for someone looking for a MFD to use with their PC.
customer_reviews.author: David Gullickson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful color photo printer
customer_reviews.text: It makes photos just as good as the ones from the photo shop, and does a great job of regular printing, scanning, and copying, too. The on-screen menu and manual make it easy to use. It has a tremendous amount of functionality for the price. With the right software and a phone modem, it can be used as a fax machine, too. This little printer puts out pages just as fast a my old, large printer, and it takes up very little room. I couldn't be more pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve W.

customer_reviews.title: Love the Printer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this printer for our business. And even though it didn't come with a Printer Cable, I had one I could use. My wife loves the small form factor, and the fact that it "nested" under our "Check-Out" counter. It was inexpensive and only requires two ink cartridges and comes with many of the same features of our Canon MG8220. Buy it.......you will be very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this Canon PIXMA MG2220
customer_reviews.text: I know there may be other printers out there that do just as good a job as this one but I've got to say that I had been struggling with a Lexmark and then an Epson to get them to print photo images in high-quality color and neither could do it. I received this Canon and in just a few minutes had it up and running and printing excellent color images. Mine didn't come with the CD-Rom, however my Windows 7 found the new hardware and installed the drivers effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer
customer_reviews.text: My original printer finally gave up the ghost so I had to get a new one. I looked over several printers but did not want wireless. This printer I could also scan whatever I need to into my computer, a plus. It does have fax capability but I won't be needing this but, of course, you never know what will happen later. It was easy to install and works like a charm. So what can I say good deal, and no complaints. Now I just have to keep the cats from exploring it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this printer since I got it and I love it. The only criticism I had is that the software that comes with the printer will NOT work if you use remanufactured cartridges. I would suggest if you want to use it, you keep some Canon cartridges on hand. However with Canon cartridges being almost 40.00 a pop, I will forfeit the software for the cheaper remanufactured cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Henson

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: This was a cheap and simple printer that I thought would meet all my needs. However, I was wrong! The first time I tried to scan something, it wouldn't work. I spent time troubleshooting the issue and it got me nowhere. Eventually, I used someone else's scanner. Then, I went to print photos with this printer. When I click print, nothing happens! Absolute waste of money and a major headache. I wish I could return this piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm33

customer_reviews.title: Great printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer prints much more clearly than my laser printer. It's a pleasure to read the clean crisp output. The price is cheap for this multifunction machine. The scanner works perfectly as well as the copy function. I've not tried to fax yet so no comment on that. You just can't beat it for price and quality. The multifunction machine is a bargain. Of course, the ink refill cartridges are not a bargain. Still, this machine is great for light home use.
customer_reviews.author: StephenR

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and works okay
customer_reviews.text: This printer works well for student and it's not expensive compare to others on the market. The print function uses up a lot of ink so be prepared to refill them within a month. The images and letters quality aren't that great (laser printer is a lot smoother than this one). The scanner works great though. The printer takes about 5-10 minute to warm up before each use. I'd recommend this product to any student though since it's inexpensive. It's heavy but affordable.
customer_reviews.author: CatInTheHat

customer_reviews.title: Not Pleased with Canon at all.
customer_reviews.text: When I received my printer set it all up put in both ink cartridges. I run a test page and I'm told there is no ink to cartridges to please put in the ink and try again. I removed the ink and retried putting them in again and retried to print, got same as above need to put in your ink. I finally went to Kmart and purchased ink for around $65.00 - $70.00 on ink now it works. Thanks lyg662
customer_reviews.author: lyg662

customer_reviews.title: Seller is great/ product is awful
customer_reviews.text: Let me clarify!! The product arrived exactly as stated. However, I have not been able to print anything since I received it. I have been using scanner/ printers for at least a decade and buying from ebay- I have never had an issue. This is not the seller's problem, it is the product. I have not been able to print anything since I received the product, more than two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: jessika wood

customer_reviews.title: No USB 2.0 printer cable included
customer_reviews.text: I am currently out of the country but in a (USA Territory) and I needed to do some printing. I order this printer and it arrived on time but then I notice at setup that no USB printer cable was included. I then order the printer cable, but I had to travel to another location before the printer cable arrives. I was very disappointed. Please check what's included before you order the item and do away with the headache.
customer_reviews.author: FDR

customer_reviews.title: I love my new printer!
customer_reviews.text: This printer is good quality, small, and quiet! I would definitely recommend this product. It prints things a little funny at first, so it definitely needs to be re-aligned, but other than that, the quality is good, the scanner is easy to use and works great as well. This printer works with a standard USB cable for any other Cannon printer BUT IT DOES NOT COME WITH ONE. The guide is easy and fast to install as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shhay

customer_reviews.title: Bought twice WON'T buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this printer twice now and both times after a short time the printer starts having time loading the paper, it just won't suck the paper in anymore! The only reason I don't get to upset is usually by the time it breaks I need more ink and the printer with both inks cost the same as the ink alone. Basically giving me a free printer. But, I WILL NOT BE PURCHASING THIS PRINTER AGAIN TWICE IS ENOUGH. I have learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: deely

customer_reviews.title: Great printer for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printed for my granddaughter who's in college because I've had so much luck owning one myself. My old printed needed an ink cartridge every time I turned around. This Canon doesn't require as much ink replacement. My color copies are fantastic. I especially love that I can also make copies. I would definitely recommend purchasing this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A. Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Excellent multi-purpose machine!!! as good as any $100 copier/printer/scanner for less than half the price, Great Value! OK, it doesn't come with the USB Type A male -to-B male cable, but who nowadays haven't had a printer and recycled the cables? is the same cable you use in any other regular printer. Worse case scenario, knowing it doesn't come with it, well just order one, is only $3 add-on item, it would arrive at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: leona

customer_reviews.title: Ripoff Report - Beware
customer_reviews.text: I received the brand-new item and this is the first printer that I've ever bought that didn't include the cable going from the printer to the laptop. Since this is not a wireless-enabled printer, the cable is required. Therefore, add another $10-15 to your purchase if you have to go out and buy another one. USB A/B
customer_reviews.author: Seth DC

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent printer, copier, scanner, etc. ~ A true bargain for what you get
customer_reviews.text: When my HP 940C printer bit the dust, I searched for a replacement on Amazon. Out of sheer luck, I ran into this product, a combination printer, copier and scanner. I only paid $41 for it, yet it is so much more useful than the single purpose HP printer that it replaced. It performs flawlessly and is unquestionably a best buy, even at the price Amazon is currently listing it at.
customer_reviews.author: Expressed Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I choose this item over Lexmark's, Dell, HP and other brand and my last two printers was Lexmark's which performance decrease as it got older. This Canon printer has performed better than what I expected and I wish I had purchase a difference model with all of the bells and whistles. I like this product so much that I plan to buy my camera from Canon also.
customer_reviews.author: ltyus07

customer_reviews.title: Pixma MG2220
customer_reviews.text: Has not worked right from day one. Black ink prints great. Color is always blurred. I have troubleshooted several times. Online with company and they recommended to do what I had already done. The problem is still ongoing .Changed colored ink cartridge, the whole shebang. Still it is blurry. Also shuts it;s self off and I have to turn it on every time I want to print something then I have to hand write every colored letter. SO NO I AM NO HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: Paula K Clark

customer_reviews.title: Will not last longer than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: stay away. This is my 5th Canon Pixma printer. after a few months, the printer begins to cause problems. Firstly, certain labels will not print but jam. secondly, the 'low ink" lamp always lights up even when you replaced the ink. This printer is good for 6 months. after that, you'll need to throw it. and this is my 5th Canon pixma
customer_reviews.author: Buyer14211

customer_reviews.title: Busted after Return Window
customer_reviews.text: I give it 3 stars because it was exactly what we needed until it went wonky. Started printing like it was having a seizure after the return window had already closed (naturally). Everything it spits out is shaky-looking like it was shuddering with every printed letter. Bought it on 7/8 and then around 9/12 it started doing this. Had our company's tech look at it, but there was nothing they could do about it. Since it was outside the return window, I could only return it for 80% of purchase price but Amazon Customer Service was helpful in getting that taken care of for me.
customer_reviews.author: PPS

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: I have had this printer for 5 years now and I love it. It does go through ink a bit quickly, if you are printing a lot. Bought one for my sister when she started college and haven't had any complaints about hers either.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Worst printer I have had the misfortune to purchase yet
customer_reviews.text: Succeeded in printing properly without a jam, without claiming the printer was out of paper (it wasn't out of paper), without driving me up the wall, every one in four tries. Then after 10 or 12 actual copies, announced it was out of black ink! Worst printer I have had the misfortune to purchase yet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fessel

customer_reviews.title: Canon PIXMA MG2220 Color Photo Printer with Scanner and Copier
customer_reviews.text: I like this printer and it's noisy but works just fine. I like the paper tray better than the HP I replaced with this one, it's more sturdy and allows me to add paper without having to pull out the tray which I always found to be a pain on the HP. The on board controls are on the top which isn't good for me but I can use the controls from a desktop file to get around that problem, otherwise I would have to stand up to work the printer.
customer_reviews.author: J from Md

customer_reviews.title: Canon Printer
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th printer in 3 years....bad luck with HP, Kodac, and Lenox...so thought I would try a "cheaper" one. So far I really like it. No issues, except it did not come with the USB cord....but I saved one from last printer, so that worked. Small in size which is good.I would recommend to anyone on a budget that really needs a printer.
customer_reviews.author: Critter Keeper

customer_reviews.title: Almost too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: Price very low, performance excellent. Large size for some, but works for me. Have used all features with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: W. Shreve

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: this item was far more than I had expected and I would reccomend any one wanting a printer to go out and buy this one do not waste you money on more expensive ones on the market. You might be like me and get a real expensive lemon that spent most of its time aggrevating me to no end. it took a long ride to the dump. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: TUNA

customer_reviews.title: Like!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim because I really needed a printer, the software was kind of a pain to install because for some reason it wouldn't automatically download by USB. Prints out great though and scans well. For the price I couldn't complain, I don't use it for too much, just needed it for emergency things.
customer_reviews.author: SBS

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer/Scanner for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I chose this product because it has both things I need in one for a great price - a printer and scanner. The only thing I didn't know about was that it doesn't come with a USB cable to connect to the computer. If I had known that, I might have bought the wireless printer with the same company. But I'm happy with my purchase now that I have the cable! :)
customer_reviews.author: Haseeb Ansari

customer_reviews.title: for me it's perfect
customer_reviews.text: Don't do a lot of copying, scanning or printing but for my use it's perfect. Saves me time and money by not having to find a copy shop and paying them $$$ for just a few copies. Price was perfect for the conveinence of not leaving home to make copies.
customer_reviews.author: peteski

customer_reviews.title: Prints well
customer_reviews.text: I like the printer for its size, the quality of the prints, and the fact that is has a good scanner. I don't like all of the grinding , snapping, and clicking noises it makes when getting ready to print. If I had paid any more for it, I would have given it a three, but I can honestly say that the photo printing exceeded my expectations - so it got a 4.
customer_reviews.author: Donno

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed in this machine.
customer_reviews.text: This printer has the color on at all times and it goes through color ink even when I am printing black and white. I had someone unhook the color and now all I can print in is black and white. It went through two cartridges of color in the manner of two months. I would not recommend it to anybody because I can't afford it. .
customer_reviews.author: Myrtle R Hodgson

customer_reviews.title: POOR PERFORMANCE
customer_reviews.text: Had this printer for 2 years with light household use when the paper feed stopped working completely Hard to print with no paper feed Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: nun2happy

customer_reviews.title: Never again for me
customer_reviews.text: I went through three of these with a life span of 5 minutes to 2 months. I tied a rope around mine and got it swing real good then hit a large tree with it. Didn't hurt the tree but boy, did it feel good after all the problems I've had with this company.
customer_reviews.author: D. H

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, quality printing
customer_reviews.text: The price I paid is less than the cost of the replacement ink cartridges. It's reliable and very good. However, as with all printers, they could pay you to take it since, like cellphones, the ink is where the profit is. Printer companies even change the cartridge design when after-market companies are copying theirs too well!
customer_reviews.author: Al Borrelli

customer_reviews.title: Ink is exspensive
customer_reviews.text: This is a great printer at a good cost. Set up was easy, and it does everything it is supposed to do. The only problem is the exspensive ink. I will be looking into refilling the old cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Why only a 3-star
customer_reviews.text: One of the main reasons I have for needing a printer is to enlarge/reduce pictures/drawings for my art projects. When I choose this printer I did not realize it could not do this; I thought (apparently in error) that sizing was a basic component of printers. Other than that I am happy with this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Stone

customer_reviews.title: Very nice price
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a nice printer. Directions givin by canon though dont help. Your best to just call them. They will get you up and going in no time. I'm happy with it. And got it in one day with amazon. Things canon can tell you isn't on the directions. Olmost a must to call.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Laschower

customer_reviews.title: Best printer I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say I'm a connoisseur by any means in regards to printing as I don't do any kind of professional printing tasks and haven't tried out all of the other many brands of printers out there on the market but for the money I don't think this thing can be beat. So far everything I've done on this printer, scanning, printing, installing cartridges, etc. has been smooth and flawless. I still cannot believe it's only $39 bucks!
customer_reviews.author: acio

customer_reviews.title: Shipping time; it came early!
customer_reviews.text: This, so far, is a review of shipping. EXCELLENT it came, 45 minutes ago, day before scheduled delivery date! When I get the time I will hook it up and review! Considering Christmas is less than 10 days away, this is outstanding! Can't wait to have my orders drop from the sky! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Willyblues

customer_reviews.title: It is a bargain
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what people expect from this thing. I bought one a couple of weeks back for $40 (amazon, not another seller here) and it is unbeatable for the price. It is compact, does everything well, and includes ink. And for those having a stroke over no usb cable being included.....well, so what.
customer_reviews.author: jg

customer_reviews.title: Like the printer, ink cost too high.
customer_reviews.text: We are happy with the printer, now it is almost out of ink and we failed to check the replacement cost for ink cartridges. To replace both cartridges cost more than we paid for the whole printer, something wrong with this picture.
customer_reviews.author: Galen Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, inexpensive, and if you refill the cartridges... low cost of operation too!
customer_reviews.text: This is the replacement for the 2120 (which I also have). The design has been improved, less issues with paper feed. Yes, I bought another one. The Inktec refill kit makes operating this printer VERY affordable, and the printer itself does a very good job all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: John Yezeguielian

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive printer!
customer_reviews.text: I got this a few months ago and I have no complaints. I haven't had any issues with it. Although I haven't had need to use anything but the printer so I cannot review the copier/scanner. Inks included. Cable sold separately but it is inexpensive. Shipping was fast. Set up was simple.
customer_reviews.author: Derek G.

customer_reviews.title: Out of paper error message every time i try to print
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this printer for 1.5 months and it has increasing problems feeding the paper. It gives me an error message that it is out of paper, which it is not, every time I try to print something. I can't recommend this product because of this problem.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fazwa

customer_reviews.title: poor
customer_reviews.text: This unit quit working several months after purchase. It was too late to return to Amazon. Cost of repair is nearly as much as the original price. It went to the recycle center
customer_reviews.author: seedyone

customer_reviews.title: Canon Printers
customer_reviews.text: This printer was delivered rather quickly to the house. It works well for my wife, as does my Canon printer in my office. I like the Canon printers because they are top/down feeders. Why not let gravity do most of the work and why try to bend paper or card stock around a corner and down.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Farina

customer_reviews.title: ADVERTISED AS WIRELESS BUT NOT WIRELESS
customer_reviews.text: This was listed as wireless - NOT. Works well after I got the necessary products to make it work. They were no help with instructing me as to how to get it to work and what else I needed to make it work. Cost me more than necessary because had to buy a cable. It was not wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J. Chaney

customer_reviews.title: comment review
customer_reviews.text: The only item that didn't come as advertise was the speakers, in the given image the speakers were single items. what was shipped was a speaker like bar. other than that everything else came as depicted. i would say next time use an image of the actual items being sold.
customer_reviews.author: Jose M. Ayala

customer_reviews.title: great great printer/scanner for the price
customer_reviews.text: i bought this baby for 40 dolls and i scanned more than 1500 photos out of the box. good hardware and very nice software with it. Worked tirelessly for hours and hours per session, never glimpsed. overall great product for the price. highly recommended from an it.
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: Confusing
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me thinking that it was a wireless printer because he typed in wireless printers unaware that wired printers would be mixed in with the search, the product itself was fine but amazon needs to be a little more specific with the shoppers who are new to shopping on-line, he was heart broken that he messed up, however returns are pretty easy with amazon and our wireless printer is on its way right now. :)
customer_reviews.author: amanda loggan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars For Sure
customer_reviews.text: I have never bought a Canon that didn't give me my money's worth. I even wore out my first one. I used gallons of ink with that one and it bit the dust. Then someone stole it. The replacement Canon printer worked great up until I moved and left it behind.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy A. Bird

customer_reviews.title: Better than you think !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an "Inexpensive" printer for my 2nd. computer. There is absolutely nothing second rate about this printer ! It has surpassed all my expectations on what I thought I was getting. Would definitely buy another one ! Remember to also buy the Canon Pixma USB 2.0 Printer Cable Cord A-B 10' 10 FT to gone along with it as it dosen't come with a cable cord . Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Canon Pixma Printer
customer_reviews.text: This is a good printer bought at a great price. It prints good quality photos .I have never had a problem with it. I would have given it 5 starts except the ink refills are priced too high.
customer_reviews.author: Patti S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: This printer is a POS
customer_reviews.text: It died before the first ink was used up, but one day past any warranty, so I am screwed. After years of using Canon printers, I give up. I just ordered an Epson WF 3520, and I'm sure it will work better.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Tonsing

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I have to sit at the printer and feed the paper through it when printing or it won't grab the paper and then says it's empty. Very annoying but I don't print much at home so I put up with it. Not the best printer though.
customer_reviews.author: Melipooh

customer_reviews.title: Scanner stopped working after very little use
customer_reviews.text: I haven't bothered using this much after the scanner stopped working unexpectedly. It simply doesn't respond to scans. Looking to invest in a new printer with a feeder and wifi instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Canon PIXMA MG2220 Printer
customer_reviews.text: Searched a lot for replacement printer. My last one was a Kodak and I loved it. This printer works equally well. Its great to have a copier and scanner too. I bought it mainly for printing pictures and it does the job. It was a real bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Honeysuckle

customer_reviews.title: So far I am happy
customer_reviews.text: Had to spend a lot of time on the phone with Canon support to get it working; but after that I am pleased with the prints and scanning. Much better scanner that my stand alone Canon. Prints look good and I can recommend. Very good value for money
customer_reviews.author: FlagstaffGuy

customer_reviews.title: Easy,Noisy,OK
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised at a reasonable price. Lots of options that I do not use. They are mostly unique to cannon. Printing quality in B&W is very good. 8 X 10 color is average to poor. Very easy to install & use on my HP laptop with Windows 7.
customer_reviews.author: R. keller

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as my old HP F340
customer_reviews.text: It's a little....odd I suppose. It prints relatively slow, haven't tried to scan anything yet and it feels old/clunky like the really old printers from back in the day. Also when I click "print" to print something, I wish it wouldn't ask for confirmation each time.
customer_reviews.author: Vonte'

customer_reviews.title: CAN'T BEAT IT FOR FIFTY BUCKS!
customer_reviews.text: I use this printer with the laptop out in my garage. It does everything I need it to do. Much better than the Dell (Lexmark) one that could not seem to be able to communicate with the computer without a restart. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: tinbender66

customer_reviews.title: It works. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: It prints so-so and does its scan duties. Adequate for what I need, and on my budget, I appreciate being able to print and scan from home for a $39 price. Canon: Wish it would turn on from the computer, as my old Canon did.
customer_reviews.author: Amiable Cook

customer_reviews.title: Love Love
customer_reviews.text: My previous printer stop working. After looking at several printers, I chose this one. I Love it. It prints so clear. Photos are beautiful. It was easy to setup. This is a keeper and recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: NMO

customer_reviews.title: and still works as fine as it did the day I got it
customer_reviews.text: This printer has had a lot of use, and still works as fine as it did the day I got it.. I wish they still made it, The new model just doesn't seem to be as good as the one it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: only to have it crap out again a week later
customer_reviews.text: This thing crapped out on me after a week of use. Said there was an issue with the ink cartridge. I bought new ink--color AND B&W, only to have it crap out again a week later, after ONE print job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic Printer
customer_reviews.text: This is a good basic printer for normal home use. Make sure you set the print quality to fast, or your ink will disappear fast! Haven't tried a photo, but the copy, scan and print functions work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great for home use
customer_reviews.text: Works well, prints out quality artwork, photos, etc. Very competitive price! I haven't used it commercially, but I'm sure it can work well in the office. Smaller capacity, though. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Nice printer
customer_reviews.text: It's basically a standard printer/scanner/copier. It does what it needs to do. Nothing to get too excited about, but I needed an inexpensive new printer, and here it is! Be aware that it does NOT come with a cable.
customer_reviews.author: Cel

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: This printer has served it's purpose well. I have only used it for printing thus far and it works. It is a little slow in printing, but other than that works well. It was quick to hook into my computer and has been easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: MEG

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer is great. It doesn't cost a lot and it works for everything I need. Print cartridges need to be replaced kind of often if you use this for business but overall a great reliable printer.
customer_reviews.author: Birdmonkey

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this printer for my daughter to take to college. She states that it has been great and perfect for her use. Been printing every day she said.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Lover

customer_reviews.title: CAnon Pixma MG2220 color photo printer with scanner and copier
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I am well pleased with this. It is slower printing than other printers but it prints well. It can be used to scan and print without turning the computer on and this is somewhat time saving for me.
customer_reviews.author: S. Petty

customer_reviews.title: great printer at a super price
customer_reviews.text: great printer at a super price...well packaged and arrived on time...am a 67 year old handicapped lady and found the Canon printer easy to install and it really works perfectly...I highly recommend this product...
customer_reviews.author: Mary L

customer_reviews.title: Great printer!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a couple years ago and it's still going strong. Good print quality with acceptable decent photo printing. Not bad for less than forty bucks! Bonus, ink is not expensive either. :D
customer_reviews.author: Tim R.

customer_reviews.title: printer
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new printer and went on amazon and found this one and it is great works like I thought it would and I love the Canon printers all the way in my point of view they are the best printers ever so Thanks to all and Thanks to Amazon Love it
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Lines all over the page.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried about 20 times to clean the nozzle and to run every single test there is to get rid of lines on my page and nothing will fix it! When you look this printer up on google it comes back with 3 star reviews (out of 5) I even tried buying 2 new ink cartridges but that didn't work either. I would love a refund but it's too late :(
customer_reviews.author: M W

customer_reviews.title: I had doubts...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the price as soon as I saw it but I wondered if I'd be able to use it with my macbook pro. It works wonderfully and set up was quick and easy although you will need the cord to attach the printer to your computer. I'm glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Lonathan

customer_reviews.title: Scanner not working properly
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the scanner would stop working in the middle of sending data to the computer. I am not sure why this is happening but the cord appears to work just fine. I never have a problem printing or sending data to the computer.
customer_reviews.author: SerialReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best when it comes on to the mechanics
customer_reviews.text: Not the best when it comes on to the mechanics. It doesn't work well with my Mac Laptop but the printout is beautiful. I had to return to my good old Lexmark.
customer_reviews.author: Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Canon Printer
customer_reviews.text: It works just perfect. I have not used the photo printer part as yet, as I have had to print many copies of a write up I have completed. I will soon need to make copies of photos I have taken during my vacation. I am sure those photocopies will be just great.
customer_reviews.author: bobs trains

customer_reviews.title: Hello
customer_reviews.text: It's a great printer, scanner and fax machine. It would stand up as good as a HP. Installation was a whiz. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Pacman577

customer_reviews.title: Liked my Pixma MP210 better
customer_reviews.text: The MG2220 is front loading with double shelves in the front making it fit awkwardly below my computer. The software that is now used to scan is different and not as intuitive as with the MP210.
customer_reviews.author: Philip B. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible paper feed
customer_reviews.text: I'm baffled at the number of positive responses. There are several reviews that mirror our experience with this printer. It started with poor paper feeding nearly from the start after just a handful of prints and now it gets consistently jammed after the initial paper feed. Worst electronic purchase we've ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie L. Feagin

customer_reviews.title: Works flawless
customer_reviews.text: Bargain, does color pictures great! Print on both sides easy to do. Love it! Wireless print to my laptop(s) and has large paper tray for worry free printing.
customer_reviews.author: Masao Miwa

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: The printer was fairly easy to set up on my laptop and connect. The set-up instructions had very clear diagrams that were easy to follow. It has had no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: I got the printer right on time. I set it up, installed everything and uninstalled my previous printer. After restarting my computer, I tested the first document, it was printed perfectly. The scanner worked perfectly as well. Color is a little slower than black and white. There are no major issues from the start. I will post if the printer has a short life. Currently, this is the easiest, quickest printer/scanner I've used.
customer_reviews.author: kara cooperr

customer_reviews.title: I Love this printer!
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned or considered owning a Canon printer before... Now I am hooked! The print quality amazing. The only downside is that the printer will tell you it almost out of ink which is not the case. My friend has the wireless model and he gets the same low ink level warnings long before the cartridge is empty.
customer_reviews.author: David brewerton

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Was gonna use it as a 2ndary printer for home. I had to return mine. First of all, this is for Windows 8 application. I have Windows 7 and it really messed up my computer. I get an error message everytime I try to print anything!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Bones

customer_reviews.title: lack of connecting cable!
customer_reviews.text: i was not familiar with installing printer before. I thought that, all of printer's accessories were already included on box. However, there is no cable to connect printer with my computer. thus, i have to waiting 4 more day to order separated cable from amazon! problem is not about the price of the cable, but i really uncomfortable to waiting for another order coming while can not use the new printer immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Smiley Phan

customer_reviews.title: Canon Pixma MG2220
customer_reviews.text: this is an awesome printer. does everything i need it to do and more. I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for an affordable 3-in-1 printer. It doesn't take up much space, and the print quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Glesge

customer_reviews.title: Good 3-in-one
customer_reviews.text: The printer works great (though i wish I could have afforded a double sided copier), scanner is good on flat images. I use an Apple computer and the process of initial set up was effortless.
customer_reviews.author: A.R.

product_meta.title: Canon PIXMA MG2220 Color Photo Printer with Scanner and Copier
product_meta.description:
Relieble All-In-One with FastFront and Borderless Photo Printing

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


 The PIXMA MG2220 Inkjet Photo All-In-One is great for printing documents and photos thanks to its hybrid ink system. Print gorgeous, borderless photos at home up to 8.5" x 11" size with a maximum print color resolution of 4800 x 1200 dpi1 with the convenience and quality of Canon FINE ink cartridges. You can change the cartridges and add paper all from the front of the printer thanks to FastFront. 

 My Image Garden2 software puts all of your favorite printing features, such as Fun Filter Effects like Fish Eye and Blur Background, Full HD Movie Print3 and more all into one convenient software application. Plus, My Image Garden adds great photo organization convenience with calendar view and facial recognition. With your memories in one place it is easy to print beautiful, borderless photos to share and enjoy. It’s also your creative coach as the software offers creative templates in various color combinations and patterns for your fun photo projects. My Image Garden also gives you access to CREATIVE PARK PREMIUM4 where you can download exclusive creative projects and content. And be sure to look for the Canon "Print Your Days" App5 on Facebook. You can create fun collages to print and share on your timeline.

OVERVIEW


For the 9th year in a row, Canon U.S.A. is proud to have received the 2012 Readers' Choice Award for Service & Reliability from PCMag.com for Printers.* 

*A trademark of Ziff Davis, Inc. Used under license. Reprinted with permission. Copyright. 2012 Ziff Davis, Inc. All rights reserved. 

Click here for a larger image PIXMA MG2220 INKJET PHOTO ALL-IN-ONE
 

 Reliable All-In-One with FastFront and Borderless6 Photo Printing 

 * My Image Garden software makes organizing and printing your photos fun and easy with great facial recognition, Fun Filters, Calendar Organization, Automatic Layout Suggestions and so much more!2
 * FastFront feature makes is easy to change both ink and paper right from the front of the printer.
 * Hybrid Ink System utilizes pigment black ink for crisp text, and color dye ink for beautiful photos.





FEATURES & BENEFITS

 

SPEED & QUALITY




 Terrific Resolution: 
This level of quality is achieved by 4800 x 1200 maximum color dpi3 thanks to Canon Full-photolithography Inkjet Nozzle Engineering (FINE) with a patented print head firing ink droplets as small as 2pl. This delivers superb quality and detail in both your business documents and photos. 


 High Performance Ink Cartridges: 
These two genuine Canon ink cartridges contain specially formulated inks for great document and photo quality. One is a Black cartridge for crisp text and one is a multi-color cartridge for beautiful photos. Both are easy to use and replace. 

 Beautiful, Borderless Photos Fast: 
Print a borderless, 4" x 6" photo in approximately 44 seconds.7 


 ChromaLife100: 
This system combines enhanced FINE print head technology with select genuine Canon inks and select genuine Canon photo papers for beautiful borderless photos that will last up to 100 years when stored in an archival-quality photo album.8 

 

EASE OF USE


 My Image Garden: 
My Image Garden software makes organizing and printing your photos fun and easy with great facial recognition, Fun Filters, Calendar Organization, Automatic Layout Suggestions and so much more!2 


 Full HD Movie Print: 
Full HD Movie Print software turns HD movie clips captured with your compatible Canon EOS Digital SLR or PowerShot cameras into beautiful photo prints.3 


 Fun Filter Effects: 
Have all sorts of fun with your images by adding new effects such as: Fish Eye, Miniature, Toy Camera, Soft Focus and Blur Background before you print. 


 FastFront: 
A new, convenient way to load your PIXMA printer with genuine Canon FINE ink cartridges and paper so you're ready to print as fast as ever. 

 

CONNECTIVITY



 Hi-Speed USB: 
Plug the cable into your PC for a super-fast connection for your data transfers. 

 

ADDITIONAL FEATURES & BENEFITS



COMPATIBILITY
WHAT'S IN THE BOX
 * Windows 7, Windows 7 SP1, Windows Vista SP1, Vista SP2, Windows XP SP3 32-bit9
 * Mac OS X v10.5.8, 10.6, 10.79

 * PIXMA MG2220 Inkjet Photo All-In-One
 * Manuals and other documents
 * Setup CD-ROM
 * FINE Cartidges: PG-240 Pigment Black Cartridge, CL-241 Dye Color Cartridge
 * Power Cord


COMPARE

PIXMA MG2220
Inkjet Photo All-In-One PIXMA MG3220 Wireless Inkjet Photo All-In-One PIXMA MG4220 Wireless Inkjet Photo All-In-One CURRENTLY VIEWING
Functions Print, Copy, Scan, Photo Print, Copy, Scan, Photo Print, Copy, Scan, Photo Speed & Quality ISO Print Speed (up to)10 / 
4" x 6" Borderless Photo7 Print Resolution (up to)1 / 
Minimum Ink Droplet Size Ink Cartridges / Tanks Ease of Use Auto Duplex Print - LCD Display My Image Garden Included2 Print Your Days5 FastFront Connectivity Built-In Networking - AirPrint - Google Cloud Print - - PIXMA Cloud Link - - Direct Photo Printing - USB Connectivity 
GENUINE CANON INKS & PAPER

PG-240XL / CL-241XL with GP-502 50 sheets Combo Pack PG-240XXL Black Cartridge PG-240XL Black Cartridge CL-241XL Color Cartridge Click Here for Genuine Canon Papers 

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

DISCLAIMERS
 1.  Resolution may vary based on printer driver setting. Color ink droplets can be placed with a horizontal pitch of 1/4800 inch at minimum. To install using Windows OS, .NET Framework 4 is required. Compatible still image formats are PDF (created using Canon PDF Creator only), JPEG (Exif), TIFF, and PNG. Compatible video formats are MOV (from select Canon digital cameras only) and MP4 (from select Canon digital camcorders only). "Full HD Movie Print" is available from "MOV" and "MP4" movie files created by select Canon EOS, PowerShot and Vixia digital cameras and camcorders. Requires a PC, or Mac with Intel processor and Canon ZoomBrowser EX 6.5 or later or Canon ImageBrowser 6.5 or later for "MOV" files, or Canon ImageBrowser EX 1.0 or later for "MOV" or "MP4" files. CREATIVE PARK PREMIUM is a premium content service available exclusively to users only when all of the colors of genuine Canon inks are installed. Print Your Days requires Microsoft Silverlight 5, an Internet connection and runs on Windows Internet Explorer 8, 9 and Google Chrome on a PC running Windows 7 or Windows Vista. Will also work in Firefox under Windows 7 (32-bit) and Windows Vista (32-bit). Envelopes and High Resolution Paper are NOT supported for borderless printing. Photo print speeds are based on the standard mode driver setting using photo test pattern(s) and select Canon Photo Paper. Print speed is measured as soon as first page begins to feed into printer and will vary depending on system configuration, interface, software, document complexity, print mode, types of paper used and page coverage. See www.usa.canon.com/printspeed for additional information. Based on accelerated testing by Canon in dark storage under controlled temperature, humidity and gas conditions, simulating storage in an album with plastic sleeves. Canon cannot guarantee the longevity of prints; results may vary depending on printed image, drying time, display/storage conditions, and environmental factors. See www.usa.canon.com/chromalife100 for additional details. System requirements vary by application. For Mac OS, an Internet connection is required during software installation. For Windows OS, .NET Framework 4 is required to install My Image Garden, Quick Menu, and Easy-WebPrint EX software. ISO/IEC 24734, 24735 define the default print and copy speed measurement methods. Print speeds are the averages of ESAT in Office Category Test for the default simplex mode, ISO/IEC 24734, excluding time to print the first set. Copy speed is the average of FCOT, ISO/IEC 24735 Annex D. ADF copy speed is the average of ESAT in General Performance Test for the default simplex mode, ISO/IEC 24735, excluding time to copy the first set. See our www.usa.canon.com/ipm for additional details. 
    
    Additional Disclaimers 
    
    Easy-WebPrint EX requires Internet Explorer 7 or 8 for Windows, Internet Explorer 9 for Windows Vista SP2 (or later) or Windows 7, or Safari 4.0 - 5.0 for Mac OS X v10.5.8 - 10.6.x. Optical resolution is a measure of maximum hardware sampling resolution, based on ISO 14473 standard Warranty programs are subject to certain conditions and restrictions. See www.usa.canon.com/support for details.
feature_bullets: My Image Garden software makes organizing and printing your photos fun and easy with great facial recognition, Fun Filters, Calendar Organization, Automatic Layout Suggestions and so much more!
FastFront feature makes is easy to change both ink and paper right from the front of the printer
Hybrid Ink System utilizes pigment black ink for crisp text, and color dye ink for beautiful photos

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars520 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
